concept.title: Control Character Removal
concept.shortdesc: You can use several stages to remove control characters - such as escape or end-of-transmission characters - from data. Remove control characters to avoid creating invalid records.

conbody.p:
pipeline designcontrol character removalcontrol charactersremoving from dataWhen the removes control characters, it removes ASCII character codes 0-31 and 127 with the following exceptions:
9 - Tab
10 - Line feed
13 - Carriage return

You can use the following stages to remove control characters:
Directory origin
File Tail origin
Kafka Consumer origin
JMS Consumer origin
JSON Parser processor
Log Parser processor
